title: Reading maps
creator_credit: John T. Bobbitt and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Designed for use in elementary social studies teaching, this film is an introduction to the study of maps, A young boy leans about the use of maps by following roads and by locating various places. He is shown how to read a map by observing the title, scale, direction symbols and legend.
